TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. But due to previous space biological life discussions, I hate to corrupt it as well but.... it becomes a fungal hyper parasite which feeds on any animal life.

 

I wish I either had more likes or watched the likes that I do have closer

Edited August 12, 2021 by Dientus
hey ewn agep

6 hours ago, kerbiloid said:

I wish for giant mushrooms living in vacuum and eating the lunar regolith

 

2 hours ago, Deddly said:

That's too cool a wish to have corrupted, so I'm going to grant it with one small modification. The mushrooms glow. 

I wish for that too. 

That's too cool a wish to have corrupted, so I'm going to grant it with one small modification. The glowing mushrooms that can live in vacuum got bored eating the lunar regolith and started to eat and destroy random ships in space. Despite numerous attempts  to stop it,  it carries on attacking large ships with high part count and too little struts. 

So that’s how the DEEP SPACE KRAKEN was created

3 minutes ago, Dientus said:

I wish I either had more likes or watched the likes that I do have closer

Ok. You have unlimited likes, but the internet crashes, so you can’t access the fourm

 

I wish for a wish

Granted. One mystery wish.

I wish that the giant mushroom likes warmth and heads for the Sun.

Granted, but it hits earth.

I wish for a WC-130 Hercules that is immune to the aforementioned giant mushroom.

Your WC-130 Hercules is immune to giant mushrooms. But not to the giant tree the mushroom is on. You crash into the tree.

I wish Squad didn't end development on KSP.

Me too buddy. Me too…

I wish for a taco

Granted, but it is on the WC-130 Hercules that crashed into the giant tree.

I wish for a WC-130 Hercules that has not been tampered with in any way.

Granted. It’s a 1:72 scale WC-130

I wish for a cookie

Edited August 13, 2021 by Stormpilot

Granted. Check your browser cache.

I wish for my own Helium three factory on the moon.

Granted. But there is no air to float.

I wish for (lunar ice)-cream.

Granted.It has regolith taste about it. (Helium three is used as an energy source)

I wish to have a basketball game in moon level gravity.

Granted. The players and the basketball now have 6 times as much mass.

 

I wish to have a fresh, non-infested, peaceful, apolitical, non-venerated, non-transmogrifying, tasty normal-sized Russet-variety potato that I can eat without dying or having other health problems, needing to travel, remove from packaging, or having to throw out.

Granted. Though you may want to cut off the blue bit first as a child grabbed it when it a rrived and has been using it to make colourful stamps on butchers paper using some blue ink.

I wish that the basketball players grew up in a 2 g environment.

Granted. The square-cube law still exists, though.

I wish to have a fresh, non-infested, peaceful, apolitical, unmodified, non-venerated, non-transmogrifying, tasty normal-sized Russet-variety potato that I can eat without dying or having other health problems, needing to travel, remove from packaging, or having to throw out.

Granted. Already granted. just cut off the blue bits and it will be fine to eat, doesn't need to be thrown out and isn't suffering from anything else.

I wish to see Earth from space without anything causing me any harm or distress of any kind.

You can. It's a shame that you then have to spend the rest of your life paying for the ticket that took you there.

I wish for KSP 2 to arrive on time.

Granted. There's a forum fight about metallic hydrogen.

 

I wish to have a fresh, non-infested, peaceful, apolitical, unmodified, non-venerated, non-transmogrifying, tasty normal-sized Russet-variety potato that I can eat without dying or having other health problems, needing to travel, remove from packaging, or having to throw out.

Granted. The potato is not infested. It peacefully infests by itself.

I wish for potato and mushroom hybride. (Potatoshrum?)

Granted. You get a potatoshrum. Unfortunately it is in of the Cordyceps genus and infects humans taking over their nervous systems and changing them into fruiting bodies that spread it further.

 

I wish that humanity didn't end as fungal zombies.

Definitely Granted. I am going to be having nightmares about zombiefying fungus now, yuck!!

I wish for something not scary or dangerous.

Granted. A soft and cute pink bunny, happily escaped from the radioactive waste storage full of mutated zombies.

I wish K in KFC was meaning Kerbal.

Previously Granted, which is why there is no other life on Kerbin.

I wish for my Kerbulldog.

Granted, but it’s name is jeb and it proceeds to climb onto a cluster of 100 srbs and crashes them into the ksc

Gene kerman and wernher von kerman are VERY angry and requests you pay a fine of 1000000000000 funds

I strap them to an ICBM and launch them into LKO.

I wish to fly.

Granted

 

I wish to watch
